articles.title: Gasdermin D found to play a crucial role in heart arrhythmias
articles.description: Atrial fibrillation (AF) is a common form of heart arrhythmia, a serious condition in which the heart beats so fast that its upper chambers, the atria, quiver. This irregular heartbeat can increase the risk of severe conditions, including heart failure, dementia and stroke.

articles.title: Gloucestershire company wins prize for inventing way to produce clean water on moon
articles.description: Naicker Scientific wins £150,000 for device that produces drinking water from icy lunar soil
articles.content:
A £150,000 prize for a device that can produce clean water from icy lunar soil has been won by a pair of inventors whose solution involves a microwave oven, a motorised device for feeding woodchips into a barbecue and sound waves.

articles.title: Solar Eclipse 2025: When and where to watch in US
articles.description: Sky watchers in 13 US states can witness a partial solar eclipse on March 29, 2025. Discover key viewing times, locations, and safe viewing methods for this cosmic spectacle.
articles.content:
Sky watchers in parts of the United States will soon witness a partial solar eclipse on March 29, 2025. Unlike the total solar eclipse of 2024, this event will feature the moon partially obscuring the sun, creating a spectacular celestial display.
